Exaggerate: The claim states that members of the alt-right group the National Policy Institute can be seen on video doing a Nazi-like salute. This may be an exaggeration as it does not provide concrete evidence or specify the number of individuals involved.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the provided claim.

Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the alt-right group National Policy Institute and its members can be associated with Nazi-like salutes based on the video excerpts provided. This assumption may be problematic as it does not consider individual intentions or beliefs.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the actions of the individuals in the video. It assumes that their actions directly reflect a Nazi-like salute without exploring other possible motivations or interpretations.
Contradict fact: There is no contradiction of fact in the provided claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
